This is my Web Application

Laboratory #1 Getting Started with Firebase and Git, Objective: To introduce students to Firebase, a backend as a service (BaaS) platform, and help them create a simple web app and save their code to Git.

Despite being not that knowledgable when it comes to programming, databases, and other IT related topics, I still pursued IT because it is what I want and love from the very beginning.
